articles.description: Monoclonal antibody treatments for coronavirus are plentiful, but hardly anyone is getting them.

articles.author: Raetta Holdman
articles.title: Doubling Up Masks Creates ‘Obstacle Course’ For COVID, Colorado Doctor Encourages You To Consider It - CBS Denver
articles.description: Wearing a mask provides protection against COVID-19 both for the person wearing the mask and those around them. Now we're hearing wearing two masks may offer even more protection.
